definition.text: It is possible to embed YouTube videos at a Docs page. All you need to know is to copy and pate the YouTube video id into a paragraph with Youtube style.

paragraphs.text: The syntax to embed a YouTube video at a Docs page is the following:
This would render the following video:
To edit a YouTube video found at a Docs page, you need to right click slightly on top of the upper border or the video, not on the video itself.
